Lydia
Leí

Lydia Leí is an active as an Web 3.0 Community Leader, Internet Computer ecosystem Influencer, and Investor. She is a blockchain advocate and leader from 2017. Now she have a very large following on Twitter. She is extremely competent in blockchain terminology and the technological side of it. Having amassed a large following herself, it's proper to say that she is also strong in Cryptocurrency, NFT, and Blockchain marketing. In 2021, Lydia joined the Internet Computer Ecosystem. Lydia believes that the IC is the future of Web 3.0 and the Metaverse.
